alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Crittenden and southwestern Shelby Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over T O Fuller State Park, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Marion, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Hulbert, Blanton, Amanea, Wyandoke, Presidents Island, Briark, Galet and Bridge Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
